div.div: Online enrollment for the 2020-2021 school year will begin May 4, 2020. Parents will have the opportunity to enroll new students as well as verify and update information for currently enrolled student...Read more...

April 22, 2020 Goose Creek CISD Families, As we continue to navigate through the nine weeks of online instruction our students are receiving, we want to make you aware of the plans to address the need...Read more...

April 17, 2020 Goose Creek CISD Family, This has been a long, stressful few weeks for our community, our state, our nation and the world. Waiting anxiously for news that COVID-19 is under control, we ...Read more...

Goose Creek CISD Families, As you know, the school closure due to COVID-19 has changed our routines, so we have worked to create committees to consider options and make recommendations in the best int...Read more...

div.a: Virtual Goose Creek CISD Board Meeting

div.div: Goose Creek CISD will hold a virtual board meeting through WebEx Tuesday, April 14, at 6 p.m. Those who wish to attend this online meeting should use the following link: https://www.gccisd.net/page/Bo...Read more...
